ModMetaData.name: Autoclose Event Notifications
ModMetaData.author: Dingo
ModMetaData.description: Important: This mod requires HugsLib, it must be installed and loaded above this mod in the load order. Ever get tired of right-clicking those notifications like "New Lovers" or "Eclipse"? This mod automatically closes old notifications (default: after 12 in-game hours). By default, only good (blue) and non-urgent (yellow) notifications are closed. You can configure every aspect of the mod in the Mod Settings menu, accessed via RimWorld's Options menu.
